userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 2098. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number 1950.249 is associated with this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, Local 874 Minute Book; WAG 152; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one bound book of minutes from Local 874.
